NewsBreak: Carcinogen Found in Heartburn Drug Zantac: Report

Stock Markets 4 hours ago (Sep 13, 2019 22:09)

© Reuters. Investing.com - U.S. and European health officials are investigating big-selling heartburn treatment Zantac and generics of the drug after a carcinogen was discovered, Bloomberg reported Friday. The drug ranitidine, branded as Zantac, was found to contain levels of a probable carcinogen in testing by an online pharmacy, according to the report. The same contaminant prompted a recall of blood-pressure pills last year. Sanofi (PA: ), the maker of Zantac, fell 0.8% in Paris trading. Its ADRs (NASDAQ: ) lost 0.3%.
